channel.title: Nick Robinson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Nick Robinson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Emilia Jones’ ‘Charlie Harper’ Lands at Row K Entertainment
item.description: Tom Dean and Mac Eldridge directed the romance that also stars Nick Robinson and bowed at the Toronto Film Festival.

item.title: Emilia Jones’ ‘Charlie Harper’ Lands at Row K Entertainment
item.description: Tom Dean and Mac Eldridge directed the romance that also stars Nick Robinson and bowed at the Toronto Film Festival.

item.title: ‘Charlie Harper’ Review: Nick Robinson and Emilia Jones Headline a Showy but Shallow Romance
item.description: A young couple navigate the ups and downs of a five-year relationship in the directing debut by Tom Dean and Mac Eldridge, premiering at Toronto.
